thag3.16:1.2: associate with the best of people.
thag3.16:1.3: Stick to the advice he gave you,
thag3.16:2.1: If you’re lost in the middle of a great sea,
thag3.16:2.2: and you clamber up on a little log, you’ll sink.
thag3.16:2.3: So too, a person who lives well
thag3.16:2.4: sinks by relying on a lazy person.
thag3.16:2.6: a lazy person who lacks energy.
